/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. On the right side of the street, there's a modern building with a gray facade and a red sign, adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
